# meshstack_service_instances (Data Source)

List of service instances.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "meshstack_service_instances" "all" {
  # optional filtering
  # workspace_identifier   = "my-workspace"
  # project_identifier     = "my-project"
  # marketplace_identifier = "my-marketplace"
  # service_identifier     = "my-service"
  # plan_identifier        = "my-plan"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `marketplace_identifier` (String) Marketplace or service broker identifier to filter service instances.
- `plan_identifier` (String) Service plan identifier to filter service instances.
- `project_identifier` (String) Project identifier to filter service instances.
- `service_identifier` (String) Service definition identifier to filter service instances.
- `workspace_identifier` (String) Workspace identifier to filter service instances.

### Read-Only

- `service_instances` (Attributes List) List of service instances. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--service_instances))

<a id="nestedatt--service_instances"></a>
### Nested Schema for `service_instances`

Read-Only:

- `api_version` (String) Service instance API version.
- `kind` (String) meshObject type, always `meshServiceInstance`.
- `metadata` (Attributes) Service instance metadata. Instance ID of the target service instance must be set here. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--service_instances--metadata))
- `spec` (Attributes) Service instance specification. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--service_instances--spec))

<a id="nestedatt--service_instances--metadata"></a>
### Nested Schema for `service_instances.metadata`

Read-Only:

- `instance_id` (String) Unique identifier of the service instance.
- `marketplace_identifier` (String) Marketplace identifier.
- `owned_by_project` (String) Project that owns this service instance.
- `owned_by_workspace` (String) Workspace that owns this service instance.


<a id="nestedatt--service_instances--spec"></a>
### Nested Schema for `service_instances.spec`

Read-Only:

- `creator` (String) User who created this service instance.
- `display_name` (String) Human-readable display name.
- `parameters` (Map of String) Service instance parameters as JSON object. Use `jsondecode()` to work with the map values in Terraform.
- `plan_id` (String) Service plan identifier.
- `service_id` (String) Service identifier.
